numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The National Football League has the smallest percentage of head coaches of color.
2. The other graphs show larger percentages of head coaches of color.
3. I wonder why there are not many head coaches of color in sports.
4. This situation impacts the POC community.
5. Some people want to coach a sports team.
6. These people may be discouraged by the graph.
7. These people may think that they will not be able to coach any sports team.
8. The graph shows the number of players of color.
9. The graph also shows the number of head coaches of color.
10. The headline is: Are sports really diverse?
